detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract ANTIVIRGIN (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ANTIVIRGIN.sol#73-198) has payable functions:
	 - ANTIVIRGIN.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ANTIVIRGIN.sol#89-91)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
